# Results

```{r, include=FALSE}
############ data import #############
chaff <- read_table2("raw-data/chaff.txt")

class(chaff)

```


```{r, include=FALSE}
#tidy data
chaff2<- chaff%>% 
  pivot_longer(names_to = "sex", 
               values_to = "mass",
               cols = everything())
view(chaff2)

```


```{r, include=FALSE}
############ create a function ################
#sum squared function made
sum_sq <- function(df, measure) {
  df %>% summarise(ss = sum(({{measure}} - mean({{measure}}))^2))
}
sum_sq(chaff2, mass)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
####### adopt function to calculate SS(x) for each group ####
sum_sq2 <- function(df, measure, group) {
  df %>% group_by({{ group }}) %>% 
    summarise(ss = sum(({{measure}} - mean({{measure}}))^2))
}

sum_sq2(chaff2, mass, sex)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
########### summarising data ##############
datasum <- chaff2 %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(mass),
            std = sd(mass),
            n = length(mass),
            se = std/sqrt(n))
datasum
```
